creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: two large, bold characters at R; smaller characters, including signature, at L center; very faint impressed tan outline of a kimono-clad woman in background; faint tan characters at LL; rectangular red intaglio stamp at UR; square red intaglio stamp at LLC
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seal, and Marks

LLC, tan, Japanese inscription
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio stamp; LLC, square intaglio stamp; on back, L edge, in pencil: [Wang Chu-an Ochikuan]
title: Spring Blessings
